thread.title_full: Mama's Creations Posts Weak Earnings, Joins EVgo, Red Cat Holdings And Other Big Stocks Moving Lower In Tuesday's Pre-Market Session - Celcuity (NASDAQ:CELC), Apellis Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:APLS) - Benzinga

author: Avi Kapoor
title: Mama's Creations Posts Weak Earnings, Joins EVgo, Red Cat Holdings And Other Big Stocks Moving Lower In Tuesday's Pre-Market Session - Celcuity (NASDAQ:CELC), Apellis Pharmaceuticals (NASDAQ:APLS) - Benzinga
text:
U.S. stock futures were lower this morning, with the Dow futures falling around 150 points on Tuesday.
Shares of Mama’s Creations Inc MAMA fell sharply in today's pre-market trading after the company reported worse-than-expected third-quarter EPS results .
Mama`s Creations reported quarterly earnings of 1 cent per share which missed the analyst consensus estimate of 4 cents per share. The company reported quarterly sales of $31.52 million which beat the analyst consensus estimate of $30.05 million.
Mama’s Creations shares tumbled 17.9% to $7.96 in the pre-market trading session.
Here are some other stocks moving lower in pre-market trading.
EVgo, Inc . EVGO shares fell 16.1% to $5.30 in pre-market trading after the company announced a secondary offering of 23 million shares. Celcuity Inc . CELC fell 12.3% to $11.01 in today's pre-market trading. Red Cat Holdings, Inc . RCAT dipped 11.7% to $9.23 in pre-market trading as the company reported worse-than-expected second-quarter financial results on Monday. Innovex International, Inc . INVX fell 11% to $11.52 in pre-market trading. EverCommerce Inc . EVCM dipped 6.7% to $11.21 in pre-market trading. Kingsoft Cloud Holdings Limited KC fell 6.4% to $8.37 in pre-market trading. Palmer Square Capital BDC Inc . PSBD shares dipped 6% to $15.04 in pre-market trading. MINISO Group Holding Limited MNSO fell 3.8% to $23.87 in pre-market trading. Apellis Pharmaceuticals, Inc . APLS fell 3.2% to $32.57 in pre-market trading. Now Read This:
